definition: senior/of a senior generation/to honor/to respect/honorific/classifier for cannons and statues/ancient wine vessel

sentences.english: Partners are less likely to feel ignored or disrespected.
sentences.chinese: 同伴也不容易感到被忽视或者不受尊重。

sentences.english: Time is respected by not wasting it.
sentences.chinese: 不浪费时间是值得尊重的。

sentences.english: For him to take that opportunity - he deserves a lot of respect for that.
sentences.chinese: 他则把握了那些机会，他配得上这些尊重。

sentences.english: The Actavis Group hf. respects the privacy of the visitors to this website.
sentences.chinese: 阿特维斯集团尊重本网站访问者的隐私。

sentences.english: Seldon the Master of Wellington College, one of the most prestigeous schools in the UK.
sentences.chinese: 威灵顿公学是英国最受尊重的学校之一。

sentences.english: People will respect you more if you own up to your problems.
sentences.chinese: 如果你坦率承任自己的问题，人们会更加尊重你。

sentences.english: We are also an animal-friendly company.
sentences.chinese: 天然富源也是一家尊重动物权利的公司。

sentences.english: The Eagles prided themselves on being clean living, not using cuss words and treating each other with respect.
sentences.chinese: 老鹰队自豪于自己的生活严谨，不说脏话，尊重他人。

sentences.english: You need someone within the organization who is well respected andaware of the political goings-on.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一个在集团里备受尊重并且了解政治动态的人。

sentences.english: We must respect the history of China, must not cut off history.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尊重中国的历史，决不能隔断历史。

sentences.english: You should show greater respect for your elders and betters .
sentences.chinese: 你应该对长辈和上级尊重些。

sentences.english: He clearly has a lot of respect for Borges.
sentences.chinese: 他显然十分地尊重博尔赫斯。

sentences.english: Leo will respect Virgo's clever and alert mentality.
sentences.chinese: 狮子座能尊重处女座的机智及警惕。

sentences.english: Seventhly, the two sides reiterated respecting the road of development each other has chosen according to its own national conditions.
sentences.chinese: 双方重申，尊重对方根据本国国情选择的发展道路。

sentences.english: Arsène Wenger is backing the Football Association's call for greater respect to referees.
sentences.chinese: 温格支持足总关于尊重裁判的呼吁。

sentences.english: Respect her rhythm of progression. This will facilitate the creation of trust.
sentences.chinese: 尊重她的进步，这将促使其对你建立信任感。

definition: to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
to cherish/to treasure/to take care of/to love and protect
to place great importance on/to treasure
to ignore/to neglect/to treat with contempt
to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate
to pardon/to forgive/to show tolerance/to contain/to hold/inclusive
